public class FunctionDecl
extends SubprogramDecl
The abstract syntax tree node for a function declaration.

  • Method Details

    • getRelAddr

      public int getRelAddr()
      Computes the relative address of the function return value.
      Note: This method assumes that the relative addresses of all formal parameters have been set.
